name: >devour
description:
This is an Interactive Fiction, my entry for the Themed Horror Game Jam #7. It's HIGHLY recommended to play the game with sound. The game runs in Full Screen.

In an Interactive Fiction, you are the main character, and you may write commands to affect the world around you. Commands are usually a verb (e.g. "jump") that may be followed by a noun (e.g. "take key"), and most feedback you'll receive is in the form of text. Examples of commands are:

- "JUMP"
- "GO NORTH"
- "TAKE KEY"
- "USE KEY in DOOR"
